text: Iveta Bartošová (8 April 1966 – 29 April 2014) was a Czech singer and actress. She played in the music poll Zlatý slavík (1986, 1990 and 1991). She was also known for her life style attracting the attention of the Czech tabloid media. She was born in Čeladná, Czech Republic. On 29 April 2014, she committed suicide by throwing herself under a train in Uhříněves, Prague. Many people think that the reason why died by suicide was because of the media harassing her. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1966 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors who committed suicide Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech singers Category:Czech television actors Category:Musicians who committed suicide Category:Suicides by jumping
title: Iveta Bartošová
